message: Let's start with a generous offer. Take it and we can end the game early!
You were too generous, I'll take a fair share this time!
A fair share for both of us. Let's meet in the middle!
You said meet in the middle, but I think I can do better!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to protect my share.
I think I'm getting closer to what I want, but I'll give you a chance to improve your offer!
Let's split it 50/50. It's the fairest way, considering the inflation.
I'm not convinced 50/50 is the best deal, I'll try to get more!
I'll give you a bit more, but I need to protect my share in these tough economic times!
I'm getting desperate, but I'll try to squeeze out a better deal!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to get something reasonable.
This is my last chance, I'll take what I can get!
